text: Leopoldo Federico (12 January 1927 – 28 December 2014) was an Argentine bandoneon player, arranger, music director and composer. He was born in Buenos Aires. In 1955 he joined Astor Piazzolla's Octeto Buenos Aires and later that year, with his own orquesta típica, he made many recordings with the singer Julio Sosa. Federico died on 28 December 2014 in Buenos Aires. He was 87. ==References== ==Other websites== *Todo tango:Federico Category:1927 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Argentine musicians Category:Argentine composers Category:Musicians from Buenos Aires Category:Writers from Buenos Aires
title: Leopoldo Federico
